=======
CHANGES
=======

1.0.0 (2025-06-10)
------------------

- python 2.7 migration

- removed z3c.jsonrpc dependency


0.6.0 (2018-02-25)
------------------

- bugfix: replace jquery live with on event handler because live is not
  supported since jquery version 1.9


0.5.0 (2012-11-17)
------------------

- initial release
